com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl

Interface IUsbSerialPort

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IUsbSerialPort.Default, IUsbSerialPort.Stub

    public interface IUsbSerialPort

    the usb-serial device(such as X9, C520H) connect with OTG cable Insert the OTG cable to X9, connect the X9 or C520 to the OTG cable with micro-usb cable
